extension.name: Periods
extension.description: Membership Periods provides facility for tracking the number of times membership renewal was carried out. It also provides link to contributions if available
extension.comments: This extension provides membership renewal periods/terms tracking. Currently, when a membership is renewed in CiviCRM the “end date” field on the membership itself is extended by the length of the membership as defined in CiviCRM membership type configuration but no record of the actual length of any one period or term is recorded. As such it is not possible to see how many “terms” or “periods” of membership a contact may have had.
